data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Om6sJrJPiUYQ7kNvgF8ejgd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAU34MWhCb3zfXYI8GdrxotTdzTc9X1m1JqRsX7-_XsRA&oe=66D8588C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wGYwEF8MoKMQ7kNvgGqSV2B&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDBtniUQfcuKXRHwry2fK7voFUfzeoW-879EviBcivEuQ&oe=66D8569F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pYIICqNCbmsQ7kNvgE67kBC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_wK12QNUtw-hO3pK2sj3ypqIJAVxsnYCXV2WjhQhrfQ&oe=66D83BF1)
